1_1KGozab6jp6jA6zVM8cTFdzMmBasriNP4f.body: If it was easy the movie industry would have done it long ago. It doesn't matter if they made fake peers and sent fake data bittorrent uses SHA1 for each piece so they can be hash checked and if a piece was bad it would try to redownload it and a peer gets banned or blocked after too many bad pieces
